flixel.system.frontEnds.SoundFrontEnd

Constructor

new()

Instance Variables

list(default,null) : flixel.group.FlxTypedGroup<flixel.system.FlxSound>

A list of all the sounds being played in the game.

music : flixel.system.FlxSound

A handy container for a background music object.

muteKeys : Array<String>

The keys used to mute / unmute the game (see FlxG.keys for the keys available). Default keys: 0 (and numpad 0). Set to null to deactivate.

muted : Bool

Whether or not the game sounds are muted.

volume(default,accessor) : Float

Set this to a number between 0 and 1 to change the global volume.

volumeDownKeys : Array<String>

The keys to decrease volume (see FlxG.keys for the keys available). Default keys: - (and numpad -). Set to null to deactivate.

volumeHandler : Float -> Void

Set this hook to get a callback whenever the volume changes. Function should take the form myVolumeHandler(Volume:Number).

volumeUpKeys : Array<String>

The key codes used to increase volume (see FlxG.keys for the keys available). Default keys: + (and numpad +). Set to null to deactivate.

Instance Methods

destroy(?ForceDestroy : Bool) : Void

parameters
ForceDestroy Kill sounds even if they're flagged survive.
Called by FlxGame on state changes to stop and destroy sounds.

load(?EmbeddedSound : Dynamic, ?Volume : Float, ?Looped : Bool, ?AutoDestroy : Bool, ?AutoPlay : Bool, ?URL : String, ?OnComplete : Void -> Void) : flixel.system.FlxSound

parameters
EmbeddedSound The embedded sound resource you want to play. To stream, use the optional URL parameter instead.
Volume How loud to play it (0 to 1).
Looped Whether to loop this sound.
AutoDestroy Whether to destroy this sound when it finishes playing. Leave this value set to "false" if you want to re-use this FlxSound instance.
AutoPlay Whether to play the sound.
URL Load a sound from an external web resource instead. Only used if EmbeddedSound = null.
returns
A FlxSound object.
Creates a new sound object.

pause() : Void

Pause all sounds currently playing.

inline play(EmbeddedSound : Dynamic, ?Volume : Float, ?Looped : Bool, ?AutoDestroy : Bool, ?OnComplete : Void -> Void) : flixel.system.FlxSound

parameters
EmbeddedSound The sound you want to play.
Volume How loud to play it (0 to 1).
Looped Whether to loop this sound.
AutoDestroy Whether to destroy this sound when it finishes playing. Leave this value set to "false" if you want to re-use this FlxSound instance.
returns
A FlxSound object.
Creates a new sound object from an embedded Class object. NOTE: Just calls FlxG.loadSound() with AutoPlay == true.

playMusic(Music : Dynamic, ?Volume : Float, ?Looped : Bool) : Void

parameters
Music The sound file you want to loop in the background.
Volume How loud the sound should be, from 0 to 1.
Looped Whether to loop this music.
Set up and play a looping background soundtrack.

resume() : Void

Resume playing existing sounds.

inline stream(URL : String, ?Volume : Float, ?Looped : Bool, ?AutoDestroy : Bool, ?OnComplete : Void -> Void) : flixel.system.FlxSound

parameters
URL The URL of the sound you want to play.
Volume How loud to play it (0 to 1).
Looped Whether or not to loop this sound.
AutoDestroy Whether to destroy this sound when it finishes playing. Leave this value set to "false" if you want to re-use this FlxSound instance.
returns
A FlxSound object.
Creates a new sound object from a URL. NOTE: Just calls FlxG.loadSound() with AutoPlay == true.
